perk.name: mind break
perk.description: A mind can be bent, or broken. To a broken mind everything around them is a threat, unable to tell friend from foe they lash out in fear.

missText.text: You attempt to penetrate TARGET 's mind unsuccessfully
You exert your psychic pressure on TARGET but they resist you

hitText.text: You penetrate TARGET 's psyche and attempt to demolish her mind
You penetrate TARGET 's mind and attempt to shatter their sense of reality
